page.title: 15BROADLANDS ESTATE 1
page.content: {Broadlands}was the former home of{Lord {Mountbatten}and{Lord Palmerston.Prince {Charles}and{Princess Diana}stayed there on their honeymoon . Broadlands is on the outskirts of{Romsey. {Broadlands Estate}owns alot of land includingthe fabulous grounds and house which are open to the public. {Lord Romsey}now owns Broadlands. Lord and Lady Romsey plannedan exibition to illustrate Mountbattens fabulous life and achievment. It was opened only months after the tragic death of Mountbatten. Broadlands Estate owns cottages,farms,woods,forests,farmhouse s and even a sawmill called New Forest Thinnings. The wood goes to coal mines and is used to support hydraulic jacks. The bits that are left are used as firewood and for fence building. Nightingale wood is owned by Broadlands .
